sentences.sContent: I cherish for you the liveliest feeling of affection and gratitude.
sentences.sContent_eng: I cherish for you the liveliest feeling of affection and gratitude.
sentences.sCn: 我对你怀有最强烈的爱和感激之情。

sentences.sContent: To my father I dedicate this volume in token of affection and gratitude.
sentences.sContent_eng: To my father I dedicate this volume in token of affection and gratitude.
sentences.sCn: 我谨以此书献给我的父亲， 以表示对他的爱戴和感激之情。

sentences.sContent: To my teacher I dedicate this dictionary in token of affection and gratitude.
sentences.sContent_eng: To my teacher I dedicate this dictionary in token of affection and gratitude.
sentences.sCn: 我谨以此词典献给我的老师，以表示对他的爱戴和感激之情。
